talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Huh?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Violent Scoundrel$
Ahhhhhhh!!!!!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Do you know me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Violent Scoundrel$
I'm sorry.I won't do it againI'm sorry!
I will try being a reallynice person now! Please don't hit me!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>… Wait. What did you just say?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Violent Scoundrel$
Oh? Ah…
(Suddenly, the Scoundrel's face turns pale as if he realized something.)
Oh, I don't know! I don't know! I don't know for sure!
Ah! I was rude to the stranger! Sorry!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I'm certain that you already know <FONT color=#a82424>my name</FONT>)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Violent Scoundrel$
Ehhhh?! I'm so sorry!
How… how… How would I know a scary person like {user_nick}?!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Finding Another Me$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Makes a quick escape.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Violent Scoundrel$
I'll leave now.Show some mercy! I will be a good man!
※ Go to Red Lotus Palace Main Street and tell Healer Kanna what happened.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Kanna… Something weird happened. <FONT color=#7e12d2>(Explains what happened.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
{user_nick}, why the long face? What's going on?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What? Impersonating me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
Is that so...? Are you telling me he's impersonating you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But as soon as he sees me, he screams.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
That's possible. He impersonates you, pretends to be a strong mercenary, robs people, uses violence...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No way is there a bandit out there as <FONT color=#a82424>handsome</FONT> as me.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
... What? There's a bandit who looks like you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yup.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
(Kanna's hand flinches briefly.)
I'll pretend I didn't hear that.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yeah, I will. (I'll have to find out for myself. There is something going on.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
I'll look into it, so don't worry about it. Just take care of your health!
※ Go to the Streets of Red Lotus Palace and look for witnesses.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Eh? (Wait, I've never seen that kid before.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Pitiable Kid$
Hey, Mister... I mean, Bro! Are you back already? How is Daddy?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Aha, that kid seems to have met the <FONT color=#a82424>impostor</FONT>... Let's see.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Pitiable Kid$
You said you'd help me find Daddy! You told me you'd give him the flower pancakes Mommy made for him
and let me see him!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No, I forgot the way to your dad's place, so I came to ask.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Pitiable Kid$
What, did you forget your appointment?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Aha…)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Pitiable Kid$
How could you forget? (It's Loser's Exile Place!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(So the impostor is in <FONT color=#086171>Loser's Exile Place</FONT>.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Pitiable Kid$
Hurry up. You said you'd help me meet my dad!
I'll be waiting here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>... I'm not that old. See you soon.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Pitiable Kid$
... You told me to call you Bro instead of Mister,
but I think you're an old man since you forget the destination!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I should go to Loser's Exile Place.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Pitiable Kid$
Yes, Bro! Please find my dad!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yeah, just wait a little bit.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Pitiable Kid$
I'll be waiting here.
※ Go to Loser's Exile Place and find the impersonator.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh? Who is this? You've been running away?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
(Monk Wangpung, who was playing dead, flinched when you poked him.)
Oof?! Wh-, what do you want this time again?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(He sure has a weird way of talking.) No, it's not like that, don't worry.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
It's yo-you! Don't tell me that Lady Hwaran sent you to kill me, did she?!
Don't kill me please! Show some mercy! I don't want to die.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>If I were going to kill you, I would've killed you last time!</html>
<html>But forget that. What do you mean by "again?"</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
(Monk Wangpung, splayed out on the ground praying, looks up at you furtively.)
You… You aren't here to… do away with me?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Why is he calling me Boss…?) Eh? Different outfit?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
(Monk Wangpung seems very relieved.)
Well, as to that, I hid here because you were passing through a while ago with a different outfit, Boss.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Pink?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
Yep, different clothes… They were pink clothes. Even withcolorful hair…
I thought to myself he must have picked up a new taste in fashion… And then I came here to hide.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I see… (<FONT color=#a82424>A guy who looks like me</FONT> that passed by in a <FONT color=#a82424>pink</FONT> outfit...)</html>
<html>Thanks for letting me know. Then, I'll be on my way.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
Anyway, I saw him and a shabbily dressed man leaving together. Saw it with my own two eyes.
So I thought I was safe…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(End conversation)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
(Face lights up.)
Oh, you are leaving? Goodbye then!
※ Return to Streets of Red Lotus Palace and look for other witnesses.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Him again? What a busy man he is.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Mr. Phantom Thief! Did you find my doll already?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, I-, I'm sorry. I forgot where the doll is, so I came back to ask.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Mister? Where is my doll?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh? well, this is… (She is sharp!)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Ah, I see. How come youroutfit color has changed?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well, yeah, you sure figured me out... Hahaha.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
You're disguised because you're a Phantom Thief!
(The girl nods as if she understands.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yeah, but... There's something I want to hear again.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
So you're going to find my doll now?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(Receives the reward.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: What in the World?
journal.contents:
A strange thing happened. There was an infamous troublemaker in Red Lotus Palace who suddenly ran away the moment he saw {user_nick}. What in the world's going on...? You need to talk to Kanna.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street -Healer Kanna
journal.destination: Talk to Healer Kanna at Red Lotus Palace Main Street
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Healer Kanna at Red Lotus Palace Main Street.

journal.title: What is this About?
journal.contents:
Kanna speculated that there might be a guy pretending to be {user_nick} who does whatever he wants. She told you to stay quiet while she looks into it, but you can't stand by while a guy impersonates you. You need to find a witness around Streets of Red Lotus Palace.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace -???
journal.destination: Look for witnesses in the Streets of Red Lotus Palace
journal.todo_msg: Look for any witnesses in the Streets of Red Lotus Palace.

journal.title: Impersonated
journal.contents:
According to the boy you met on the street, the impersonator went to the Loser's Exile Place. He must be confident in his combat skills. You'll have to go look for him first.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street (Red Lotus Palace Outskirts) - Loser's Exile Place (????)
journal.destination: Look for an impostor in Loser's Exile Place
journal.todo_msg: Look for an impostor in Loser's Exile Place.

journal.title: By an Unknown Man
journal.contents:
You unexpectedly met Monk Wangpung in Loser's Exile Place. It seems he has been eking out an existence in the Exile after escaping the Silver Treasure Vault. According to Monk Wangpung, the impostor already left Loser's Exile Place with the boy's father. You should go back to the Streets of Red Lotus Palace and look for
another witness.
Streets of Red Lotus Palace - ????
journal.destination: Look for a witness in the Streets of Red Lotus Palace
journal.todo_msg: Look for another witness in the Streets of Red Lotus Palace.
